snippet.title: Forrader Hero Early Access Trailer
snippet.description:
https://steam.pm/app/2056490

Forrader Hero is a somewhat casual yet tactical turn-based roguelike dungeon crawler where fantasy heroes can’t step back and must fight through the end.
